divs: Sighting Detailsi saw two identical white lite objects floating over sun valley california around 2:22 pm they stayed the same distance apart and floated at various speeds in a north east direction please contact me 1-818-579-6032
Summary: i seen 2 hovering objects white glowing in the sky
